title: Allow players to change runes/masteries/spells at start of game before leaving shop
body:
inb4 someone says "or don't forget to change your runes/masteries/spells before the game starts aren't I clever MYEHHHH"

... Don't be that guy.

Upvote if you like. Downvote if you're that guy. *sniffle*

This would be particularly helpful in ARAM with all the back and forth in trade and more mixups with builds that doesn't always leave me with enough time to think picks and builds through before I end up with clarity on xin.

replies.body: Only issue with that is it could lead to trying to counter the enemies runes/masteries/spells

> [{quoted}](name=BAPenguins,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AeUqejog,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-16T18:13:57.078+0000)
>
> Only issue with that is it could lead to trying to counter the enemies runes/masteries/spells

Given there are sites to look up those set-ups. This is a big issue.

Asking for anything to do with Runes is pointless because of the incoming runes rework. Also, your suggestion would make all of the IP people have spent on rune pages completely worthless, as you would only ever need the one

> [{quoted}](name=Jbels,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AeUqejog,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-16T18:10:36.687+0000)
>
> Also, your suggestion would make all of the IP people have spent on rune pages completely worthless, as you would only ever need the one

I didn't say "edit rune pages". I said "change runes", which always means in terms of setup, "switch rune pages".

They had it like this forever so you need to buy more runepages. With RP.
Soon as the rune/mastery changes happen, this might also.
